verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come let us sing,
Sing till the power of the Lord comes down. (2x)
Lift up your hands, be not afraid.
Come let us sing till the power ofâ€“the Lord comes down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Christ Jesus lives, He is alive in His church today. (2x)
So let us rise and follow Him.
Christ Jesus lives , He is alive in His church today.
